raw: Coronavirus sport news updates: Roman Abramovich to aid NHS staff as Fifa meet after Euro 2020 postponed and cricket suspended indefinitely .
replaced: Coronavirus sport news updates: Roman Abramovich to aid NHS staff as Uefa meet after Euro 2020 postponed and cricket suspended indefinitely .

raw: Uefa made the decision to postpone Euro 2020 until 2021 due to the coronavirus , with the coronavirus still impacting the sport for the foreseeable future .
replaced: Uefa made the decision to postpone Euro 2020 until 2021 due to the coronavirus , with the coronavirus still impacting the sport for the foreseeable future .

raw: It should allow for the Premier League and Europe ’s other elite football leagues to finish , not to mention the Champions League and Europa League – though a contingency for those tournaments is yet to be finalised .
replaced: the coronavirus should allow for Champions League and Europe ’s other elite football leagues to finish , not to mention the Champions League and Europa League  Champions League and Europa League – though a contingency for the Champions League and Europa League is yet to be finalised .

raw: The French Open in tennis and the PGA Championship in golf are just two more major events postponed or cancelled due to Covid-19 , while the Olympics in Tokyo this year continues to resist pressure to postpone the Games .
replaced: The French Open in tennis and the PGA Championship in golf are just two more major events postponed or cancelled due to Covid-19 , while the Olympics in Tokyo this year continues to resist pressure to postpone the Games .

raw: Fifa now plan to meet in an effort to help ease the impact of coronavirus on the football calendar , while the Premier League have joined Uefa in their efforts to finish their respective competitions by 30 June .
replaced: Uefa now plan to meet in an effort to help ease the impact of coronavirus on the footballing calendar , while Champions League have joined Uefa in Champions League efforts to finish Champions League respective competitions by 30 June .

raw: While multiple Brooklyn Nets players have now contracted the virus , including NBA superstar Kevin Durant - here ’s how we brought you the latest updates from around the world on Wednesday as coronavirus continued to hit sport hard .

raw: Uefa has said its aim is to complete the Champions League season by 30 June this year amid the chaos that coronavirus has caused the footballing calendar .
replaced: Uefa has said Uefa aim is to complete the Champions League season  Champions League season by 30 June this year amid the chaos that coronavirus has caused the footballing calendar .

raw: Earlier on Tuesday , Euro 2020 was postponed until 2021 in order to free up space this summer to ensure club football campaigns around Europe can be finished .
replaced: Earlier on Tuesday , Euro 2020 was postponed until 2021 in order to free up space this summer to ensure club football campaigns around Europe can be finished .

raw: In a statement , Uefa said it had convened and “ unanimously agreed ” on a commitment “ to complete all domestic and European club competitions by the end of the current sporting season , i.e. 30 June 2020 at the latest , should the situation improve and resuming playing be appropriate and prudent enough ” .
replaced: In a statement , Uefa said Uefa had convened and “ unanimously agreed ” on a commitment “ to complete all domestic and European club competitions by the end of the Champions League season , i.e. 30 June 2020 at the latest , should the situation improve and resuming playing be appropriate and prudent enough ” .

raw: Uefa also agreed upon the “ possible adaptations of the 2020/21 Uefa Champions League and Uefa Europa League qualifying rounds , ” however , “ in case of late completion of the 2019/20 sporting season , i.e. after 30 June 2020 .
